backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with authorization checks, wallet address validation, and CRUD-style profile operations stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature-to-file mapping report outlining gameplay, 3D rendering, interaction, and UI-shell update features with linked components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, hooks, components, and match-3 engine modules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base/body styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint defining the root mount node and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, theme provider, profile-gate logic, and router setup.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright, attribution link, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, user menu, and Play Game button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: React form to collect and save a user's display name with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/game/match3/engine.ts: Core match‑3 logic for board initialization, tile swapping, and match detection.
frontend/src/game/match3/types.ts: Defines match‑3 game types, tile constants, board structure, and result interfaces.
frontend/src/game/match3/useMatch3Game.t: React hook managing match‑3 board state, tile selection, swaps, scoring, and restart.
frontend/src/game/three/layout.ts: Provides 3D spatial layout helpers for tile and stone positioning.
frontend/src/game/three/materials.ts: Maps tile types to Three.js colors and exposes color utilities.
frontend/src/game/three/StoneMatch3DBoar: Three.js scene rendering the 3D match‑3 board, tiles, stones, and interaction logic.
frontend/src/game/three/useStoneAnimatio: Manages stone animation states and provides a helper for smooth position animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, state management, and persistent identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and wallet addresses via the actor API with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes plus custom component styling such as game tiles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectWallet.tsx: Wallet management page allowing users to view, link, update, and remove their wallet address with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Match-3 game page displaying a 3D board, score, and controls using the match3 game hook.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, user greeting, and links to the match-3 game and app features.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, typography, container queries, animations, and custom theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the game project's metadata, state, features, and requirements for a 3D match‑3 stone game.
